titleStmt.title: The Church militant historically continued from the yeare of our Saviours Incarnation 33. untill this present, 1640. By William Vaughan, Knight.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, William, 1577-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Paine for Humfrey Blunden, at the Castle in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: "At least 1 [Harvard] copy has errata on Aa4r"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
